subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Union Rags, ridden by his new jockey John Velazquez, overtook Paynter in the final stretch to win the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Union Rags, ridden by his new jockey John Velazquez, overtook Paynter in the final stretch to win the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes.
